ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] A strange place to climb (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: WOW!  Very nice climb.  Gives me something to strive for.  So far, I ve been up the wizard spires, and the RV bank, but than I m only 13th, so have a little
ygData.messageBody:
WOW! Very nice climb. Gives me something to strive for. So far, I've been up the wizard spires, and the RV bank, but than I'm only 13th, so have a little while before I can attempt that one. Nice to know I'm not the only dare devil bard around. Everyone thinks I'm nuts, but hey, it's a great view up there. *smiles*

Willowlark
13th Bard
Karana Server
----- Original Message -----
From: Khelan
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Sent: Monday, October 30, 2000 10:44 AM
Subject: [eqbards] A strange place to climb (OT)


Well, I was slightly bored on Saturday, so I decided to climb the statue of Firiona Vie in FV. Anything that tall is just meant to be climbed :). I don't think it would be possible to anyone not a Bard, but it may be possible. Visit http://www.clandlc.com/Firiona/ for screenshots and a description of how I did it.

Hope a few of you try it yourself, it's a blast and a great view : )

--Khelan

eGroups Sponsor


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.
